sentences.en: A few fatal cases of postinfectious encephalitis have been reported.
sentences.cn: 曾有几例病后脑炎致死的报道.

sentences.en: Above results showed that the encephalitis model of HSV can be used to research antiHSV agents.
sentences.cn: 结果说明所建立的HSV脑炎模型可用于评价抗HSV药物.

sentences.en: Children ill with meningitis or encephalitis are usually hospitalized.
sentences.cn: 儿童并发脑膜炎,或脑炎通常就医治疗.

sentences.en: CONCLUSION Actinomycin D can stimulate encephalitis B virus replication.
sentences.cn: 结论:放线菌素D可使持续感染的乙脑病毒复制增加.

sentences.en: Conclusion Cranial MRI contributed to early stage diagnosis of virus encephalitis.
sentences.cn: 结论头颅MRI有助于病毒性脑炎的早期诊断.

sentences.en: Did encephalitis appear be treated fortunately after the symptom?
sentences.cn: 脑炎出现了症状以后还好治 么 ?

sentences.en: Encephalitis still attacks one child in 1,000 who catches measles.
sentences.cn: 每1000位患麻疹的儿童中仍会有一位患上脑炎。

sentences.en: Herbs for the prevention of encephalitis can be found everywhere in this area.
sentences.cn: 预防脑炎的草药在这一地区俯拾皆是.

sentences.en: Insect borne diseases like dengue fever tick - borne encephalitis and malaria will spread.
sentences.cn: 虫媒传染病,如登革热,森林脑炎,疟疾正在蔓延.

sentences.en: Objective Analyze the clinical characteristics of Postinfectious encephalitis according to cases.
sentences.cn: 目的根据临床病例分析并总结感染后脑炎的临床特征.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the early diagnosis and treatment of viral encephalitis.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨病毒性脑炎的早期临床诊断和治疗.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the related factors influencing the prognosis of children viral encephalitis.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨影响小儿病毒性脑炎预后的因素.

sentences.en: Objective To prepare purified tick - borne encephalitis vaccine.
sentences.cn: 目的制备森林脑炎纯化疫苗.

sentences.en: Stuttering can be a rare early manifestation in Japanese B encephalitis.
sentences.cn: 这位病患的后天性口吃推测可能由于皮质语言运动区破坏所导致.

sentences.en: These charge vaccine including Japanese encephalitis , B and DPT.
sentences.cn: 这些收费的疫苗包括乙脑 、 乙肝和百白破.

sentences.en: This report details data collected as part of the California Encephalitis Project, begun in 1998.
sentences.cn: 该报告将始于1998年的加利福尼亚脑炎项目的数据详细阐述.

phrases.tran_cn: 流行性乙型脑炎；日本乙型脑炎
